DOC.brief_summary: Enrolled subject receive Ultherapy™ System treatment back hand . Follow-up visit occur 90 day post-treatment . Study photo obtain pre-treatment 90 day post-treatment
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Evaluation Ultherapy™ System Aging Hand
DOC.detailed_description: Before Treatment : The subject 's eligibility ( inclusion/exclusion criterion ) assess , 5-point Hand Grading Scale wil evaluate Investigator charge assessment . Treatment : The Investigator apply eligible subject Study Device Ultherapy™ System 20 line 1.5 3.0 probe respectively back leave right hand . Post-Treatment : All subject visit Institution at12 week day procedure , take photo back hand . Efficacy evaluation perform Photographic Evaluator .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year . Score 1 3 The 5point Hand Grading Scale Subjects understand study content sign informed consent Presence active systemic infectious disease Significant scar hand treat Previous episode surgery hand treat Subjects aesthetic addiction , drug abuse , alcohol abuse
